item.title: Hometown Value Guide
item.description:
Hometown Value Guide

Want to create more new customers and increase loyalty with the from the customers you already have? We provide opportunities to connect with and deliver consumers to your location, or get them to call you, time and time again. Helping local businesses profit using the powerful tools of direct mail and mobile rewards is what the Hometown Value GuideÂ is about. We help to make it easy for you, the business owner, to expand your reach, measure results, get new customers and reward existing clients.
